ext_mess.h

00002 /* Copyright 1988 IRCAM. */

00004 
00005 #ifndef _EXT_MESS_H_
00006 #define _EXT_MESS_H_
00007 
00008 #ifdef __cplusplus
00009 extern "C" {
00010 #endif
00011 
00012 #if C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACKPUSH
00013     #pragma pack(push, 2)
00014 #elif C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACK
00015     #pragma pack(2)
00016 #endif
00017 
00018 /* mess.h -- define a symbol table and message-passing system.  */
00019 typedef void *(*method)(void *, ...);
00020 typedef long (*longmethod)(void *, ...);
00021 typedef void *(*voidstarvoid)();
00022 
00023 typedef char *ptr,*t_ptr;
00024 typedef char **t_handle;
00025 
00026 typedef struct symbol
00027 {
00028     char *s_name;           /* name */
00029     struct object *s_thing; /* possible binding to an object */
00030 } t_symbol, Symbol;
00031 
00032 #define CAREFUL
00033 
00034 #define MAGIC 1758379419L   /* random (but odd) */
00035 #ifdef  WIN_VERSION
00036 #define NOGOOD(x) ( IsBadReadPtr((void *)(x),sizeof(struct object)) || ((struct object *)(x))->o_magic != MAGIC )
00037 #else
00038 #define NOGOOD(x) (((struct object *)x)->o_magic != MAGIC)
00039 #endif
00040 #define MAXARG 7
00041 
00042 /* messlist -- list of symbols and their corresponding methods,     */
00043 /* complete with typechecking information                           */
00044 typedef struct messlist
00045 {
00046     struct symbol *m_sym;
00047     method m_fun;
00048     char m_type[MAXARG + 1];    /* wish this were indep of MAXARG   */
00049 } t_messlist, Messlist;
00050 
00051 /* this structure sits at the head of any object to which you may   */
00052 /* pass messages (and which you may feed to freeobject()).          */
00053 typedef struct tinyobject
00054 {
00055     struct messlist *t_messlist;    /* list of messages and methods */
00056                                     /* (also used as freelist link) */
00057 #ifdef CAREFUL
00058     long t_magic;                   /* magic number */
00059 #endif
00060 } t_tinyobject, Tinyobject;
00061 
00062 /* any object which wants to have inlets or outlets                 */
00063 /* needs a header with more fields:                                 */
00064 typedef struct object
00065 {
00066     struct messlist *o_messlist;    /* list of messages and methods */
00067                                     /* (also used as freelist link) */
00068 #ifdef CAREFUL
00069     long o_magic;                   /* magic number                 */
00070 #endif
00071     struct inlet *o_inlet;          /* list of inlets               */
00072     struct outlet *o_outlet;        /* list of outlets              */
00073 } t_object, Object;
00074 
00075 /* the -1 entry of the message list of an object contains a pointer */
00076 /* to its class entry, defined as follows:                          */
00077 typedef struct maxclass
00078 {
00079     struct symbol *c_sym;           /* symbol giving name of class  */
00080     struct object **c_freelist;     /* linked list of free ones     */
00081     method c_freefun;               /* function to call when freeing*/
00082     short c_size;                   /* size of an instance          */
00083     char c_tiny;                    /* flag indicating tiny header  */
00084     char c_noinlet;                 /* flag indicating no first inlet for patcher */
00085     t_symbol *c_filename;
00086 } t_class, Maxclass;
00087 
00088 /* the list of officially recognized types, including pseudotypes for
00089     commas and semicolons.  Used in two places: 1. the reader, when it reads
00090     a string, returns long, float, sym, comma, semi, or dollar;
00091     and 2. each object method comes with an array of them saying what types
00092     it needs, from among long, float, sym, obj, gimme, and cant.
00093 */
00094 #define A_NOTHING   0
00095 #define A_LONG      1
00096 #define A_FLOAT     2
00097 #define A_SYM       3
00098 #define A_OBJ       4   /* for argtype lists; passes the value of sym */
00099 #define A_DEFLONG   5   /* long but defaults to zero */
00100 #define A_DEFFLOAT  6   /* float, same default */
00101 #define A_DEFSYM    7   /* symbol, defaults to "" */
00102 #define A_GIMME     8   /* request that args be passed as an array; */
00103                         /* the routine will check the types itself. */
00104 #define A_CANT      9   /* cannot typecheck args */
00105 #define A_SEMI      10
00106 #define A_COMMA     11
00107 #define A_DOLLAR    12
00108 
00109 union word      /* union for packing any above datum */
00110 {
00111     long w_long;
00112     float w_float;
00113     struct symbol *w_sym;
00114     struct object *w_obj;
00115 };
00116 
00117 typedef struct atom     /* and an atom which is a typed datum */
00118 {
00119     short a_type;       /* from the above defs */
00120     union word a_w;
00121 } t_atom, Atom;
00122 
00123 typedef void *(*zero_meth)(void *x);
00124 typedef void *(*one_meth)(void *x, void *z);
00125 typedef void *(*two_meth)(void *x, void *z, void *a);
00126 
00127 #define BAG(s) {error(s); return (0);}
00128 #define BAG2(s,t) {error(s,t); return (0);}
00129 #define ob_messlist(x) (((struct object *)(x))->o_messlist - 1)
00130 #define ob_class(x) ((struct maxclass *) \
00131     (((struct object *)(x))->o_messlist[-1].m_sym))
00132 #define ob_name(x) (ob_class(x)->c_sym->s_name)
00133 #define ob_sym(x) (ob_class(x)->c_sym)
00134 #define ob_filename(x) (ob_class(x)->c_filename->s_name)
00135 #define ob_filesym(x) (ob_class(x)->c_filename)
00136 #define mess0(x, y)  (*((zero_meth)(getfn(x, y))))(x)
00137 #define mess1(x, y, z1) (*((one_meth)(getfn(x, y))))(x, z1)
00138 #define mess2(x, y, z1,z2) (*((two_meth)(getfn(x, y))))(x, z1,z2)
00139 #define mess3(x, y, z1,z2,z3) (*(getfn(x, y)))(x, z1,z2,z3)
00140 #define mess4(x, y, z1,z2,z3,z4) (*(getfn(x, y)))(x, z1,z2,z3,z4)
00141 #define mess5(x, y, z1,z2,z3,z4,z5) (*(getfn(x, y)))(x, z1,z2,z3,z4,z5)
00142 #define NIL ((void *)0)
00143 #define SETCOMMA(ap) ((ap)->a_type = A_COMMA)
00144 #define SETSEMI(ap) ((ap)->a_type = A_SEMI)
00145 #define SETSYM(ap, x) ((ap)->a_type = A_SYM, (ap)->a_w.w_sym = (x))
00146 #define SETOBJ(ap, x) ((ap)->a_type = A_OBJ, (ap)->a_w.w_obj = (x))
00147 #define SETLONG(ap, x) ((ap)->a_type = A_LONG, (ap)->a_w.w_long = (x))
00148 #define SETFLOAT(ap, x) ((ap)->a_type = A_FLOAT, (ap)->a_w.w_float = (x))
00149 #define SETDOLLAR(ap, x) ((ap)->a_type = A_DOLLAR, (ap)->a_w.w_long = (x))
00150 
00151 #if C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACKPUSH
00152     #pragma pack(pop)
00153 #elif C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACK
00154     #pragma pack()
00155 #endif
00156 
00157 #ifdef __cplusplus
00158 }
00159 #endif
00160 
00161 #endif /* _EXT_MESS_H_ */
